statement.p: There are 15000 students attending the community college. Find the percent of students that attend classes in the evening if there are 2320 evening students.
Round to units. Do not type the

solution.p: A percent is a ratio written out of 100, so first we calculate the decimal version of the ratio. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{2320}}{{15000}}\approx{0.15466666666667}. The percent version is \displaystyle{15.466666666667}. Finally we round to \displaystyle{15}.
